Mr. Choi Jangho is an impact activist, investor and computer programmer. He represented Korea at Future News Worldwide held at Scottish Parliament, Edinburgh. Recently he worked at Clarivate Analytics. He received a BS, Computer Science & Entrepreneurship from Dongguk University in Seoul.
